articles.title: Costco makes shopping smoother for members
articles.mainIdea: Costco makes shopping smoother for members
articles.summary: TheStreet: Costco makes shopping smoother for members. As a former Costco member, I rarely encountered any store personnel during my shopping. That's not true in every area of the store.
